'''Jack Grossman''' is a businessman who sent his assistant to attend a parenting class in his place.

==History==
Jack's wife was pregnant. He signed up for a parenting class, but sent his assistant, [[Adam (Private Practice)|Adam]], in his place. When Cooper and Pete found out that Adam was there in place of Jack, they told Adam to tell Jack that he needed to attend the class himself. After Cooper left a message for Jack calling him a jackass, he came into the practice. Cooper and Pete told him the baby was coming whether or not he was ready for it and he needed to get ready. He agreed and prepared to join the class, but dismissed Adam first after assuring him he wasn't fired.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
He is married.

===Familial===
His wife is pregnant.

==Career==
He's a partner in a firm.

==Notes and Trivia==
*He has two assistants. [[Adam (Private Practice)|Adam]] is the second one.
